name: Ether Wisp
text_description: The Ether Wisp may seem weak on the battlefield, but its magical properties can play pivotal roles. Once per turn, you can sacrifice the Ether Wisp to refresh the HP of any one Ether type card.
illustration_description: A small, ethereal figure made of wispy, luminescent gas hovers against a backdrop of a cosmic sky, filled with glistening stars. It's delicate and almost imperceptible, but its calming aura is undeniable.
